text: Bernardo de Souza Oliveira is an archer from Brazil. Oliveira competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics.Bernardo OLIVEIRA He was born on 8 June 1993.Bernardo Oliveira == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian archers Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:People from Bras√≠lia
